title: OpenAI lays groundwork for juggernaut IPO at up to $1 trillion valuation
description: OpenAI is reportedly planning a massive initial public offering. The artificial intelligence company could be valued at up to one trillion dollars. Preparations are underway for a potential listing as early as late 2026 or 2027. This move follows a significant restructuring. The company aims to raise substantial capital for future AI infrastructure investments.
content:
OpenAI is laying the groundwork for an initial public offering that could value the company at up to $1 trillion, three people familiar with the matter said, in what could be one of the biggest IPOs of all time.
OpenAI is considering filing with secu... [4582 chars]

title: Microsoft beats expectations with 18% revenue jump, but shares slide
description: Microsoft announced impressive quarterly earnings, with revenue surging due to high demand for artificial intelligence services. This boosted its cloud computing business significantly. However, the company's stock saw a decline as investors worried about how quickly AI will generate profits. An Azure cloud service outage also impacted operations. Microsoft continues to invest heavily in AI, including its partnership with OpenAI.
content:

title: YouTube Offers Employees Voluntary Buyout Amid AI Pivot
description: YouTube is undergoing a staffing shakeup as the company pivots to focus on artificial intelligence, offering US-based employees voluntary buyouts.
content:
YouTube is undergoing a staffing shakeup as the company pivots to focus on artificial intelligence, offering its US-based employees voluntary buyout packages with severance.

title: Universal Music Settles Lawsuit With AI Startup Udio
description: Universal Music Group NV signed an agreement with artificial intelligence-powered music startup Udio to settle a copyright lawsuit and collaborate on a new commercial music creation and streaming service.
content:
Universal Music Group NV signed an agreement with artificial intelligence-powered music startup Udio to settle a copyright lawsuit and collaborate on a new commercial music creation and streaming service.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Capex is the number to look at amid Big Tech earnings
description: The crux is that spending on artificial intelligence isn't going to slow down, at least for the next year, thanks to increasing demand for AI services.
content:

title: Alphabet Sales Beat Estimates On Google Cloud Unit Growth
description: Alphabet Inc. sales topped quarterly Wall Street estimates, fueled by a surge in demand for its cloud and artificial intelligence services. Shares rose as much as 7.5% in extended trading.
content:
Alphabet Inc. sales topped quarterly Wall Street estimates, fueled by a surge in demand for its cloud and artificial intelligence services. Shares rose as much as 7.5% in extended trading.

title: OpenAI may target $1 trillion valuation in IPO, reports Reuters
description: OpenAI, the company that, for many, has become synonymous with the AI revolution, is now moving towards the next step in its expansion. According to Reuters on Wednesday, which cited unnamed sources, the artificial intelligence startup OpenAI is getting ready to submit an IPO application as early as next year, which could result in a $1 trillion market valuation for the business.
content:
OpenAI may target $1 trillion valuation in IPO: reports

title: OpenAI Eyes Record-Breaking $1 Trillion IPO To Fund AGI Infrastructure: Reuters
description: OpenAI, the world's leading artificial intelligence company, is laying the initial groundwork for an Initial Public Offering or an IPO that could value the ChatGPT maker at up to $1 trillion. This will be making it one of the largest public debuts of all time, according to a report from Reuters.
